segments.text: So how did you like the restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , it could have been better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What didn't you like about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a new restaurant . I don't think they have their act together yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What did you think about the food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt that the food was pretty mediocre .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The service wasn't that great , either .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . The service was not good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that you want to try this restaurant another time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I think that I've had enough of this restaurant .
segments.speaker: S2
